name: Sensei! I don't want to sit next to.../报告老师我不要和Ta坐
name_original: Sensei! I don't want to sit next to.../报告老师我不要和Ta坐
description:
Try to find all the matching pairs for the kids in this class so they can happily go on an excursion bus sitting next to their friends not enemies.

The clues are obvious.

Simplified Chinese only for now :(
